resources.string: Failsafe Alert is active! Cancel it now, or the alert will be sent.

Launch the contact picker using the contact button in the lower right corner.

 Swipe right or left on a contact name to remove that contact.

 Swipe right or left on a phone number or email address to remove that item.

 Your message will be sent to all phone numbers and email addresses shown!

Set your email username (probably your email address) in the "Username" screen.

 Set your email password in the "Password" screen.
 Gmail users with 2-factor authentication enabled must generate an app-specific password in their Google account settings.

 Select your email server in the "Email Server Settings" screen.
 		First, pick your server from the "Pick Email Server" screen. If you need a custom server, pick "Custom", then enter those settings in the "Custom server settings" screen.

Edit the message you want to have sent in the "Compose Message" screen.

 Set the time each day you want the cancel button to activate by picking a time in the "Enable Cancellation at" screen.

 Set the time each day you want the message to be sent if the cancel button isn't pressed in the "Send Alert at" screen.
\tThis app sends a message to all selected contacts if the main screen cancel button is NOT pressed during a set time period each day.\n\n Select a help topic below for more information.
